name: Responsive Grid Layout
description:
All possible layout grid variants, ready-made! 🎁

• Mobile screens (smallest to largest)

• Tablet screens (smallest to largest)

• Desktop screens (720p & 1080p)


Important – Hit Control(^) + G, or go to "View" > "Show Layout Grids" to view grids! 👀


Copy and paste into your file for a seamless plug-n-play experience! 🎉
